events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product instead of what was ordered.
Assigning the case to the refunds department to handle the customer's request promptly and review the order details.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I'm sorry to hear that you received the wrong item. Let's get this sorted for you quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number? This will help us process your refund request faster.
Here is the photo of the incorrect item I got. The order number is 123456789. Please let me know when I can expect the refund.
Thank you for the information. We have initiated a full refund to your original payment method, which should appear within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund initiation. I appreciate your help resolving this issue efficiently.
The refund process has been completed from our side. Please check your account and let us know if you encounter any issues.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
Since your refund has been received and the issue resolved, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
